column5: great story you should be proud of him

Pretty Cool,  Reminds me of something. Whenever you watch fishing Tourney's on T.V. and after catching a nice fish, the Pro yells "That's what it's all about !!!"....couldn't be further from the truth.  Stories like this one are "What it's all about !!!"  Thanks for the reminder.   Hookset.
Thanks for the read. I was touched so much that I wrote to contact the writer to offer a day fishing at the Islands this spring.
good job hope to see the post
Classy move.     Hopefully it works out. I bet it would make for some great memories... on both sides.  Atta Boy....   Hookset.
great read and great gesture ranger!  Cheers!
WTG rangervx520   Should be a great day for everyone!
Nice.  Ders pike in dem waters.  Hope they keep at it!  thanx for the read!  cheers HD

great read!  i can't imagine trying to go through life with Prader-Willi syndrome. just think about it... no matter how much you eat, your brain is telling you to eat more. you could eat 5 or even 10 pounds of food in one sitting, and still be hungry... your brain still thinks that your stomach is empty.
